about_the_game:
Forklift Certified and a Manager?! Can you manage your reputation as you control the flow of product from your warehouse? Have the factory next door create product for you, using this product you send it to your customers. Form bonds as you level up your warehouse, increase productivity, and make some sweet cash. 

Reputation: 
Earn Reputation with different customers, and earn more favor with them. 

Leveling System: 
Level up to 20+, earning different rewards along the way!

Expanding: 
Three different types of warehouses for you to expand!

Plus more!

name: Ship It!: A Warehouse Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel I3 or Equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia 1050 or Better Direct X11 Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Become Forklift Certified and manage your factory in this simple Top-Down Management game. Ship It! Ship yourself to the world where you control the flow of product to the companies you can earn reputation with!
